required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mod of Cognitive Flexibility by tDCS, Tyrosine Polymorphisms in the COMT Gene
clinical_study.official_title: Modulation of Cognitive Flexibility by Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation, Tyrosine Administration and Polymorphisms in the COMT Gene

brief_summary.textblock:
The current study would examine whether increases in endogenous dopaminergic activity via tyrosine and the (presumed) excitation of these by anodal tDCS of the dlPFC could causally be related to cognitive flexibility as measured by task switching and reversal learning.
Additionally, the study will test whether the Val158Met-polymorphism in the catechol- O-methyltransferase (COMT) gene could also predict the effect of TYR supplementation, as this gene is involved in DA degradation in the prefrontal cortex.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured twice in each session (4 arms): at time 0 and 80 minutes into testing.
primary_outcome.description: Measuring change in perseverative errors in the WCST

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured twice in each session (4 arms): at time 0 and 80 minutes into testing.
primary_outcome.description: Measuring change in reversal errors in the WCST

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured twice in each session (4 arms): at time 0 and 80 minutes into testing.
primary_outcome.description: Measuring change in conflict cost (defined as the difference in reaction time between congruent and incongruent responses)

clinical_study.condition: Modulation of Cognitive Flexibility by Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation, Tyrosine Administration and Polymorphisms in the COMT Gene

arm_group.description: tDCS= transcranial direct current stimulation drugs= placebo (cellulose [2 grams])
tDCS= transcranial direct current stimulation drugs= tyrosine (2 grams)
tDCS= anodal transcranial direct current stimulation of the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex drugs= placebo (cellulose [2 grams])
tDCS= anodal transcranial direct current stimulation of the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex drugs= tyrosine (2 grams)

intervention.description: tDCS= A DC Stimulator Plus (neuroConn, Germany) with one 5 cm x 7 cm rubber electrode (anode) and a 10 cm x 10 cm (cathode; reference electrode), encased in saline soaked sponges will be used. The anode will be positioned over the left dlPFC, centered on F3 in the 10e20 electroencephalography (EEG) system, while the cathode on the contralateral supraorbital ridge (Fp2).Current will be delivered at 1.5mA for 20 min plus 30 s fade in/fade out periods.For sham stimulation, the current will be faded in over 30 s, at 1.5mA and then will be switched off. Drugs= 2.0 g of L-Tyrosine and 2.0 g of the placebo microcrystalline cellulose will be dissolved in 400ml of orange juice as per previously published protocols.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- • Either male or female
- Between 18 and 30 years
- You are in good health
- You agree to fast overnight prior to testing
Exclusion Criteria:
- • Are suffering from cardiac, hepatic, renal, neurological disorders
- Damaged or diseased skin on your face and scalp, or a sensitive scalp
- A history of alcohol or drug addiction, or severe psychiatric illness
- Drug treatment which may lower seizure threshold (i.e. epilepsy)
- Pregnancy
- Sleep deprivation (less than 6 hours a day)
- A history of migraine or headaches
- A history of taking antidepressants
- A history of taking tyrosine supplements
